lines.text: Come on, you know this better than anybody, right? There's a full-scale subterranean war being waged for every shred of information. And the corporate suits are killing each other off by the thousands each year. I mean it's like the holocaust in the 20th century. Everybody knows about it, and nobody says anything about it. And government is as culpable as any corporation.
This is your ticket outta the bone yard. You're dead, in case you didn't know it. You just don't have the sense to lie down.
Po-tay-to, po-tah-to, you know. Government, corporation, it's the same thing.
OK, uh, I'll think about it.
Good. Time's up... Do it - or forever wish you had.
"The hair on a snatch could tow a battleship." All you have to do is feed his grandiosity, and play... on his... horniness.
